Module org.nasdanika.ncore
Package org.nasdanika.ncore

Interface Marker

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, Marker, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Subinterfaces:
GitMarker
All Known Implementing Classes:
GitMarkerImpl, MarkerImpl
public interface Marker extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, Marker
A representation of the model object 'Marker'. Provides information about location for a model element definition - URI, line and column numbers.

The following features are supported:

  • Location
  • Position
  • Comment
See Also:
  • NcorePackage.getMarker()

    • getComment

      String getComment()
      Returns the value of the 'Comment' attribute. Optional marker comment providing additional information about the marker. E.g. for locations which do not support lines and colums it may provide position inside the resource identified by the location attribute, such as an XPath for XML documents or sheet name and a range for Excel documents.
      Returns:
      the value of the 'Comment' attribute.
      See Also:
      • setComment(String)
      • NcorePackage.getMarker_Comment()
